p: Figure 2 showed the original occurrences of N. jatamansi and N. chinensis were mainly distributed in Sichuan Province, parts of Yunnan, Gansu, and Qinghai Provinces, and the Tibetan Autonomous Region. The main areas in which N. jatamansi was distributed were the Tibetan Autonomous Region, Sichuan Province, Yunnan Province, and a small part of Qinghai and Gansu Provinces. In addition, N. jatamansi was also distributed in other countries including India and Nepal. Hence, the distribution of N. jatamansi is more extensive than that of N. chinensis.
